posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Nginx 配置
posts.text: 在windows中配置nginx： 1. 实现端口转发； 2. 实现域名转发； Start Nginx server12>cd <'nginx installation dir'>>nginx.exe Edit Configuration of server port123456789#编辑nginx.conf,使用时取消以下注释#如果要躲开几个端口,复制多个 server块#server { #listen 80; (此处可以修改nginx端口) #server_name localhost;#} Proxy for Port1234567891011# 添加upstream,使用时取消以下注释# upstream ng_server { #server localhost:90(此处修改为代理端口)#}# server { #location / { #proxy_pass http://ng_server; #}#} Proxy for Domain Name123456789# 使用时取消以下注释# server { #location / { #proxy_pass http://www.baidu.com; #}#} Stop Nginx1>nginx -s stop
